<div id="content" style="display: none;">
:::: {.whitebox data-latex=""}
  $${dw}=-P_{\text{ext}}{dV}=-P{dV}$$

  $$
  \begin{align}
  w &= -\int {PdV} \\
    &= -\int \left ( \frac{nRT}{V} \right ) \\
    &= -{nRT} \int_{V_1}^{V_2} \frac{dV}{V} = -{nRT}\ln\frac{V_2}{V_1} \\
  \end{align}
  $$
